description:
This is a short section of the East Coast Trail. The trail follows the coastline, slightly above sea level.

Note: don't forget to have a car waiting for you at the other end of the trail if you don't want to walk back. This is not a loop.  There is GPS data attached to this trail (see "download GPS"), which if loaded into your GPS can help you find route points.
directions:
More information can be found here. 



Access MOBILE:  Park at the high school, cross the river and turn east (left) onto Lower Road.  Follow the road first along the coast and then uphill to the junction with Cod Sein Road. Alternatively, drive 600 m past Mobile Power Plant and turn left onto Cod Sein Cove Rd, parking at the turnaround at the end. Be careful not to block local access. 

Access TORS COVE: Highway 10 bends sharply right at the top of a hill before descending into the community. At the bend, turn sharply left onto Back Road. Follow the land around High Hill and park in the area east of the church. Cross the road to the trailhead.
title: Tinker Point Path (part of the East Coast Trail)
